column2:
"Damn! We were only two behind...
You guys are the real deal."
"But we made good use of switching, so I'm sure it wasn't all for nothing. Good job out there, Matoi!"
"You too, Asuna. There were so many times I was convinced we would lose. You two were in perfect sync!"
"Hehe, yeah. We've been fighting alongside each other for a long time."
"I see. You really get along well."
"Yup, we've been through plenty of good and bad together."
"You two make a great couple too."
"...Huh? A couple...?! W-w-we're not at that stage yet... Right, <%me>?"
"Let's go on a date, Matoi."
"Let's go on a date, Kirito."
"Whaaa?! Wait, wait! Th-This is a very delicate matter! Later! Let's discuss this later, okay?"
"Hehe... Looks like I hit a touchy subject. Do your best, Matoi."
"Not you too, Asuna! We're just partners! Jeez, this is so embarrassing..."

"Guh! Don't get me involved, <%me>!
What if there's some kind of misunderstanding..."
"Ki-ri-to?"

"It's a joke, Asuna, a Guardian joke! Right?
...What's with that serious look?! Tell her you're joking!"
"...Ahem! Anyway! This match ended in a loss for us! Now it's time for your reward."
"Ooh...! How exciting. What is it?"
"They're moves the two of us learned. We wanted to teach them to you."
"Huh? What do you mean? Like Photon Arts...?"
"Ahh well... It's kinda hard to explain. Just think of them as a type of martial arts demonstration."
"Right... We wanted to test them out, but even with the right movements, the enemies didn't take any damage."
"...Uhh, I don't really get it, but we'll do our best to memorize what you teach us."
"Alright, watch closely."
"That was my sword skill \"Starburst Stream\", and Asuna's \"Mother's Rosario\"."
"You two should have no problem recreating them."
"...My \"Mother's Rosario\" has a lot of precious memories attached. Make sure you take good care of it, okay?"
"Thank you Asuna. I will... I'll cherish it forever!"
"We owe you two a lot... So we wanted to talk to you about something."
"I know we've told you already, but we come from a completely different world than this \"Oracle\" of yours."
"Sorry, we can't really get into the details of how we came here."
"Not at all. We're well aware that there are worlds outside of Oracle, so don't worry about it."
"I see. You two must have had similar experiences to our own then."
"I've been to many worlds in the past. I'm currently maining a world called ALO."
"But recently, I've been considering trying out my swordsmanship in different kinds of worlds."
"I thought I might be able to grow as a warrior that way."
"Why do you want to do that?"
"It's a long story, but I've recently encountered many situations that led me to that conclusion."
"Kirito..."
"So I checked into several VRMMOs... I mean, many different worlds, and that's how I found Oracle."
"Something about it caught my attention, so I made up my mind and decided to jump in."
"When I first heard about it from Kirito, I was really surprised."
"But it looked like a lot of fun, so I came along with him."
"I originally planned to look around a bit and just leave if it wasn't a good fit."
"So I wasn't thrilled when Asuna said she wanted to come with me..."
"Bet you're glad I did now, huh?"
"Yeah, thanks to her we met you two, and learned all about how great this world is."
"Even though you were busy, you took the time to guide us and teach us. We're very grateful."
"Thank you so much, both of you."
"But now we're going to go back to our world."
"We've got people waiting for us back home. And I'm sure they're sick of waiting by now. Hehe!"
"Oh... okay. Will you ever come back...?"
"Of course! Next time we'll bring all our other friends! I can't wait to introduce everyone!"
"Alright! We'll be waiting!"
"See you two! Oracle was amazing! See you sometime soon!"
"Take care!"
"There were a lot of strange things about them, but I'm glad they were such nice people! I hope we can see them again soon."
"Excuse me, Xiera here! Oh, looks like those two already left."
"Great job with them. I've finished my investigation, so please come to the Bridge!"
"Received 670 \"Sword Skill\"."
